website_summaries.verdict: If all you need is a quality ground cover that's easy to carry and store, this compact outdoor blanket fits the bill.
pros: Waterproof, sand proof, and puncture resistant
Provides effective barrier between you and the ground
cons: Won't provide warmth in chilly weather

customer_reviews.title: Returning this.
customer_reviews.text: Used it last night at a high school soccer game after it rained, the wet still leaked through. It is very thin. I am never getting it back in the case. It did help block the wind though.
customer_reviews.author: Dkje4

customer_reviews.title: Not really a blanket - more like a tarp
customer_reviews.text: This is better used as a ground cover and not expected to be a blanket. It is more like a weighted tarp. Was useful at the beach but was not what I bought it for and intended to use if for.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be much better. Not impressed especially for the price. Not worth it. Just use a towel instead!
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for day trips
customer_reviews.text: I am a tour guide and often find myself wondering the streets not knowing where to sit and hang out while I wait for clients. I don't want to pay for a drink somewhere so with my blanket I can find a little spot anywhere and relax. I found it easy to pull out and put back in the little bag. Its not too heavy to attach to my Osprey.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: this worked great for that one beach trip- it repels water and ...
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure: I have only taken this to the beach once, so I do not know its durability. However, this worked great for that one beach trip- it repels water and it is easy to brush off sand. The corner pockets are great because you can anchor it without stakes. It took two tries, but I was able to get it back in the pouch. If I have one quibble, it is that the majority of the blanket is dark gray and gets hot in the sun, but it was fine under my beach umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No clips included
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with any clips to anchor it to the ground, very disappointed when we were at the beach and discovered this, couldn't use it because it kept blowing away!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great beach "blanket"!
customer_reviews.text: we used this everyday of our beach vacation because it was so super simple to use. folds up so tiny. completely sand and waterproof. just a shake and its completely clean. very simple to get back into its pouch. now, i need to find one double the size! it was a bit small, but served its purpose well :)
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not really what I expected, it's mostly plastic and I guess I associate blanket with somewhat warm...
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas Guelker

customer_reviews.title: I love the size and function, but the corners ripped right away.
customer_reviews.text: Two of corners of the strings that attach for stakes broke on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Sand proof, my butt! It had more sand ...
customer_reviews.text: Sand proof, my butt! It had more sand on it than my beach towels did! Definitely wont be take it to the beach again. Highly unimpressed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Compact and lightweight! Great for grass/dirt surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a music festival and it was perfect, wish I had thought to purchase this for previous years. I got this in yellow so the colored band on one end made it a bit more visible in the dark. The material is lightweight and easy to fold. Used this on grass and dirt surfaces and it kept our bottoms clean and dry. Was able to fit about 4 people sitting at a time (average weight ~130-200 lbs. per person), or half sitting/half lying down. Someone did spit gum on it but was able to wipe it off. Looking forward to having it for other hiking/camping activities.
customer_reviews.author: agenthippo

customer_reviews.title: sand does not fall off and the product is so ...
customer_reviews.text: sand does not fall off and the product is so light you can't lay it down on the sand Unfortunately I used it once and cannot return so Im stuck with it
customer_reviews.author: Madeliene

customer_reviews.title: $22 for a tiny towel/mat
customer_reviews.text: I laid out on this one afternoon on the grass. It's definitely waterproof because it protected me from the wet grass, but as I was sweating (because it was extremely hot out), all of that pooled on the blanket. I put it in the wash twice and the sunscreen that I had on rubbed off on the blanket and I could not wash it out. Now the blanket is all sticky. I also think it's a little too small. Good intent, but I wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth385

customer_reviews.title: Awesome blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and even better company. There was an ever so slight problem with the blanket I was sent. I could live with it but felt like I shouldn't have to. Lo and behold the company e-mailed me to ask how I liked the blanket. I told them the truth and they were happy to send me another one. The blanket is actually quite large and I'm super stoked to use it at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Low maintenance and portable
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how compact this product is. It's easy to store and carry, easily hooked on a belt loop or bag/backpack. It's perfect for trips where ground seating is required. When I first got it I was afraid it would be too difficult to put back in the packaging but it was actually very simple and I did so in mere seconds. It is light weight making it easy to maneuver. It's low maintenance and can simply be shook off and put away. Great for camping, concerts and other outdoor events. I would like to see it in a larger size while keeping the same portability.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: So useful, sturdy and tiny!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed! Its tiny yet durable and the green I picked is vibrant and fun! It really is waterproof. I work at a summer camp and this is perfect for all our activities. It has loops for stakes but even better corner pockets I can stick rocks or shoes in to help hold it down when the kids or I need a break. My daughter already asked to borrow it for Lollapalooza this year because she can sit on it or throw it over herself if it rains!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R.

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 stars, great product, could use stakes
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 4.5 stars. The material is perfect for water and sand. It was fairly easy to fold back up, and I like that it came with a carabiner for hooking it on a backpack or stroller. The bag could be a little more durable and stretchy in my opinion, but I have boys and they are rough on things. We will use this lots of places--beach, park, concerts. The only thing that would make it better is if it included little stakes to secure it through the corners.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Lately I've been going to the park to read and I take a blanket but the blanket is always damp which is annoying. I love this! I put it under my blanket and it really is water-resistant. I also took it to the beach and I spilled my drink on it by accident and it didn't leak through. It's easy to get the sand off and easy to fold and put back in the carrier. It's light and compact, a great barrier if you want to put your blanket or towel on top.
customer_reviews.author: whit893

customer_reviews.title: Good idea with a couple flaws
customer_reviews.text: Many things about this are great! I love the fact that the tarp is lightweight and waterproof! It makes it easy to pack and essential for the PNW. I did hope that it would be bigger, it can truly only fit 2 comfortably. We bought the stakes as well to pin down the corners which is a great feature, but one of the loops ripped as we were pulling out the stakes to pack up the tarp. So that was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Whalen

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product. I really like the feel and ease ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I really like the feel and ease of carrying it around. It has a place on all 4 corners of the blanket to stake it down if you want. It's a little difficult getting back in the bag if you don't fold it correctly. Other than that a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Something any adventurer should have
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little item any hiker should keep in their pack. I keep mine as a nice emergency compact tent. I could not be more happy
customer_reviews.author: Kyler Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for having a picnic or spending the day at the beach! Not typical blanket material - more like a fabric shower curtain. Water resistant so you don't get wet if the ground is damp. Sand, leaves, grass, etc shake right off. Will also block wind if used in that manner. Each corner can be staked down with a tent stake (not included), but also has a good size 'corner pocket' that can hold a weighted item to keep it in place (rock, full soda cans, etc). Great for 1-2 people.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for that friend or family member that's cold everywhere they go!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my Grandmother who travels and has stated on pretty much every family outing how chilly she is getting. This will be perfect for any beach trip, family picnic, or chilly outdoor seating event! The corner pockets to weigh down the blanket are perfect, and if you aren't at a beach with sand you can always use a few rocks in a pinch!
customer_reviews.author: Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price, lightweight, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight little blanket, perfect for day hikes. Super light you won't notice it's with you. The only negative which was kind of obvious so I didnt deduct a star was because it's waterproof it will make you sweat on it, say if you're in the hot sun at the beach. Not too big of a deal as it can be shaken off and dries extremely fast. Because of this can also double as a makeshift emergency tarp. As far as durability goes I've had it on sticks and rocks there are a few abrasions but would still expect a lot of life out of it. For the price it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket! Small and compact. I always leave it in my purse when we travel because we usually end up at parks and we never bring blankets or towels to lay down on. So this little handy blanket is amazing to have and easy to put up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: We used this on a trip to Disney to sit on for the fireworks. It is very compact and weighs nothing to carry around. I liked the little hook that came with it. We just attached it to the backpack. Only downside it is very thin and is hard to keep it in place. We used it on concrete maybe grass might be better. Overall good to have and kept us off the ground
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Bought for ACL 2018
customer_reviews.text: 1. It fit me and 4 other adults comfortably. 2. It's really easy to get back into the case. 3. A friend used it when there was a suprise downpour (100% effective!) it covered her AND all of her gear. 4. Also works as a makeshift tent when you want to get out of the sun! 10/10 reccomend, would buy again (if it were to go missing), may purchase as a present..
customer_reviews.author: Vrey

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Blanket
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 for our trips to the beach to use under our sand chairs or for a quick beach walk w/ rest time. Great product, very easy to fold and stuff back into the carry bag. Only negative is other reviews that stated two people can sit on one blanket...if you're small and don't want much wiggle room. Buying two was definitely the best way to go for us.
customer_reviews.author: KristineK

customer_reviews.title: Light weight & durable
customer_reviews.text: Handy blankie to spread out and sit upon - keeps you dry when circumstances are wet. Quick shake off & repack (remember to open & let dry when you get home) provides a nice sitting spot at the summit, beach, lakeside, stream side. Light weight & durable.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Kidder

customer_reviews.title: Like cheesecloth, but so much nicer
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, this is NOT waterproof. Maybe water “resistant” but this will not let you laugh off the wet grass, or protect your hardwood floor when you bring something in out of the rain. Were it not for the chemicals involved, I might suggest this would be great for straining large batches of Greek yogurt.
customer_reviews.author: P. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Although this is advertised as a beach blanket, I purchase it for our trip to Europe for 2 reasons - (1) it is small and light and easily fits in a suitcase, carry-on or even my purse and (2) it's water resistant and offers protection from the rain for my mom in a wheelchair. Navigating a wheelchair with an umbrella is unwise but a rain jacket still leaves legs exposed to the rain. This little blanket kept Mom's lower half warm and dry on the rainy days and it was super easy to fold up and put in a bag when the sun came out. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Nice travel or picnic cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to Disney World, however, it was so crowded we couldn't find a spot to sit. Nevertheless, got to use it at the beach. Light enough to carry with us every where. Like the corner pockets to help hold it down. Put our slippers in it. Sand really sticks to it but worked well overall.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian_Texan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a good lightweight tarp for picnics. It’s hard to picture how big it would be and it’s a little smaller than I wish. It’s good for 2 people to relax on, but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Wish it came with stakes
customer_reviews.text: I like this more than I thought I would and have used it a lot! I'm a little disappointed it didn't come with the stakes. The description doesn't imply that it does, but there are other blankets that come with stakes and I wish I had purchased one of those. Also - this is a little hard to fold. I don't think that will be different for any other blanket, but you have to align everything perfectly to get it back into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: Nice beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to using this blanket at the beach. I love the bag it comes in. Folds up neatly back into the bag. Will probably use this for my youngest to sit in and watch his siblings play soccer and lax outside too.
customer_reviews.author: Kate R.

customer_reviews.title: One of my fave products I’ve ever bought
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite purchases. It’s a compact umbrella that can fit a whole family under when it rains unexpectantly! I also put it under my portable drying rack when I hang dry some clothes so the floor doesn’t get wet. It’s great for picnics wherever. Thank you for making this product (especially it being puncture and kid proof)!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Product Should Be Renamed: Tiny Half-Person Sand Magnet
customer_reviews.text: First use - not impressed. It's small. I used it on the beach and the sand stuck to the entire bottom of this blanket; I am guessing it has some static build-up. It's also really just a ground cover similar to one you use to put a tent on while camping - not what I'd call a "blanket" (conjures images of cozy comfort). I will give it another shot and try again soon. In fairness, the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Sand is still on it...days later
customer_reviews.text: Took it to Lake Michigan and while the sand shook off easily from most of the surface you sit on, it clung to the waterproof surface as well as the pockets on the corners. I finally gave up shaking it. It works OK, but calling it sand proof is a stretch. It went back in the bag with the sand on it.
customer_reviews.author: Indygirl

customer_reviews.title: Stop Thinking, Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about: 1) whether I needed a pocket blanket and 2) which pocket blanket to buy if I bought one. Just got this today, took it outside where the ground was soaking wet and cold. Laid on this blanket with my two big labs for an hour and never felt any water soak through and never felt the coldness of the ground. Me and my two 100 lb dogs fit perfectly and their claws didn’t puncture the blanket. BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, lightweight but not so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of this blanket. It will be great for going hiking and backpacking. I think that it is a great product, very compact and sturdy. I like that it has tabs to be able to stake it down. The blanket is more of a tarp though and not a blanket. It's not the softest or thickest and most comfortable but that is what you trade for compactness.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Dean

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pain to fold but possible. It actually does block water. So if the grounds wet and you lay this down you wont get wet. Doesnt stop the cold though, really thin. Its also smaller then i thought, Im 5'9 and have to choose between my feet or head off the ground. Still worth it though
customer_reviews.author: Jami P.

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep in the car but be ready to weight down the corners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be great to have in the car just in case and it is. There are pockets in each corner for weighting it down. Because it’s very light weight. I wish it had some even short light weight little stakes so I didn’t have to run around trying to find things to weigh down the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Z

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: this is everything i could want. it is light weight surprisingly comfortable despite being a nylon sheet. I do a lot of Glamping so space/weight/functionality is a premium. this scores high in all categories. Wish i bought two, one for me and another for my husband. wish i could give 6 stars. plus it came with a little decal which i thought was cute. 5/7 would buy again. actually i will buy another one right now.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Nice ground cover
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with this ground cover. So far I’ve only used it to keep my butt dry from early morning dew, but it will be useful for many things. My only complaint is the size of the stuff sack. I realize that compactness is important to many people, but I don’t want to spend time carefully repacking this while on the go. I just moved mine to a little larger stuff sack.
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: It was lightweight and I loved how portable it was
customer_reviews.text: I used this as soon as I received it for a festival and it fit in my small hand bag with still enough room for a few other items (Make-up, ID, keys, etc.). My friends were standing on it with wedged (thick, blocked) heels on and it did not snag or puncture. It was lightweight and I loved how portable it was. I was easy to fold up as well. The grass was damp and we didn't feel it through the material. Overall I feel this is a great product. I had friends who wanted to purchase one.
customer_reviews.author: Serina Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Super Light
customer_reviews.text: We got this for outdoor lunches at school and it is doing the trick! Super thin, super light and there's a carabiner on the bag so my daughter clasps it onto her bag. Getting it back in the bag can be tricky if you're in a rush, but it folds and rolls easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jen M

customer_reviews.title: Portable and handy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those handy items that you're happy to have around. You can put it down on damp ground and not get gross. The pockets to put some weight in the corners are a great touch. I love how small it folds up and how portable it is until you need it.
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoMomNoMore

customer_reviews.title: Not what is says.
customer_reviews.text: The item says it for the beach. It is horrible. All the sand got stuck on one side and to remove it is a horrible job so much that not all if it comes out. Its like an adhesive and sand difficult to remove. Flies away did not stay no matter how much sand you put in the pockets. Just a bad idea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: small tarp not blanket
customer_reviews.text: IT's more of a tarp not a blanket. Disappointed in deceit of description. I still kept it because I got it on prime day.
customer_reviews.author: JPRO1

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and compact!
customer_reviews.text: Stow one of these in your car for use with picnics, sporting events, the beach, or any kind of outdoor activity. The compact fit is perfect for a hiking backpack or with your camping site. The possibilities are endless! I would recommend these to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lou

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my Boy Scout son on a whim on ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Boy Scout son on a whim on a daily deal. Turned out he uses it all the time on camping trips to have a place to keep gear dry or lay down on damp camp ground for his sleeping bag. Fellow Scouts have asked him where he got it so they could get their own.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Cool for hardcore picnic people
customer_reviews.text: The product is cool, specially as a gift, presentation is nice, but to be honest if you are not a hardcore picnic person, you don't really need this.
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Cute and compact
customer_reviews.text: Upon on opening the plastic bag it came in, I was hit by a strong plasticky smell. But it dissipated quickly. I like how compact the blanket is and the little carabiner on the end. Folding it back up was not too difficult and I did it pretty quickly by myself. I haven't tested it against water yet, so I can't speak to how effective the waterproof function is or is not.
customer_reviews.author: Kaella

customer_reviews.title: More tarp like than blanket
customer_reviews.text: To avoid being disappointed with the size pay close attention to the dimensions. It is smaller than I expected but that's my fault. The material is really like a tarp not a blanket. For my use on the beach it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s too light.
customer_reviews.text: I do like how light it is, but it’s so thin and it just flies away at the park unless you pin it down. I prefer a heavier blanket. It’s too small for us. It’s okay for the beach. I had to buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Easy, Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is for our door Recess at school, kids can only sit on the grass, where there is tons of gooses poop. The teacher suggested yoga mats.. I wanted something small easy to fold and easy to clean. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nanny 12

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport, light weight blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is perfect to throw out for a picnic or day st the beach. It’s light weight and fits in a backpack easily. I just wish it was softer and not made out of a material that sticks to you if the weather is hot. It is waterproof and light weight though, so I guess that’s the trade off.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Kidman

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Took this to a festival so we'd be able to sit or lay on. It is great quality and not only did the job, but folded back up in it's little pouch and fit perfectly in the small purse I took. It didn't rain so i'm not sure how it holds up in rain, but from what it seems, it would definitely work.
customer_reviews.author: akssomebody

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Got this because of the high reviews and it is good for keeping dirt and sand off the “blanket” but it’s very thin and it’s not more comfortable than sitting in the dirt without it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought this a long time ago. So handy. Just a word of caution: I used this by a tiny campfire. Embers easily burned little holes in it. Not a knock on the product - it was my fault, just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: B. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a thicker blanket. It’s just a thin piece of, I assume, waterproof material. Haven’t tried it yet but if my opinion changes after using it I’ll update this review. Really wanted a thick picnic type blanket.
customer_reviews.author: N.M.W.

customer_reviews.title: A good beach tarp
customer_reviews.text: This is more like a tarp than a blanket; makes for a decent base but we couldn't wrap up in it to keep warm and the material is not soft or cozy. It seems to be waterproof though the sand we set it up on was pretty dry.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a unique use case (Shooting prone mat/brass catcher)
customer_reviews.text: I use this for sport shooting rifles and pistols. For rifle, I use it as a prone mat, whereas with pistol, I use it to catch ejected brass for reloading purposes. For how rough I am with it, I am blown away by the fact I have not torn it to shreds yet. It also has a very high thermal threshold as just-fired brass that is too hot to hold does not melt nor leave any marks on this. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Nate Brandeburg

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it was both sand and water resistant. However the sand sticks to this blanket like glue. If you plan on taking it to the beach, plan on taking sand with you everywhere the blanket goes for the foreseeable future. I would not purchase again. It is also the material of a tarp. The best part of this is that it is easy to fold and transport.
customer_reviews.author: normalperson

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but great for picnics and hikes.
customer_reviews.text: A little on the pricey side for what it is, but thin, lightweight, easily fold-able tarp for hiking and picnics. Comes with a travel bag with a little carabiner to throw onto a backpack or belt.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: compact and easier to carry
customer_reviews.text: This product is very convenient. It will fit in your purse, clip it to your purse or you could just clip it to your belt look. While it does have a slight plasticy feeling to it, it still does the job if you don't have time or hands to carry around a blanket for that just in case moment of sitting to chill.. It is easy to get out of the package and easy to get back in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Decent pocket blanket
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I should’ve given it better rating on easy to fold cause I’m lazy and hate folding it. But once it gets grimy from sand it’s hard to fold and takes effort. But I love having it for impromptu beach trips.
customer_reviews.author: Micayla K

customer_reviews.title: Great for packing/traveling
customer_reviews.text: Folds up into a small pouch that is super easy to transport. We take this blanket everywhere from parks to over-sea travel. Does need to be weighed down to prevent it from flying away.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry around, pull out and fold it back up. Takes up little space in a bag and easily hooks on the handles for great storage too. Great for trips to the beach and to sit out on the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a blanket.....
customer_reviews.text: To call it a blanket is a stretch. It's basically tent material and would be good to use as a small tarp. The advertising leads one to believe that it would be somewhat more substantial and more like, well.....a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Convenient, fit back into the small bag, most sand shook right off of it-even wet. It didn't stay put, even when anchored with sand as instructed, though. Not bad enough to really drop the rating much, but worth noting. Overall, a handy little thing to have.
customer_reviews.author: poeticlibra

customer_reviews.title: Great for beach and anywhere you go ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for backpacking, for beach day, for park...After I was using on the beach I will say goodbye to beach towels, just shake the sand off and no problem. This blanket is like fetters, and fast drying plus fits anywhere or you can clip to your pack .
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach blanket - well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Really light and compact. There are pockets underneath the four corners that can be filled with sand to completely weigh it down - very impressive even in strong winds. The material did not overheat in the sun and reflected moisture, sand, etc. very well. As someone who would ordinarily wonder why waste money when a regular blanket will suffice, this purchase is totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: The size was great for me to flip on to my backpack for the most recent music fest I went to. My only complaint is the bag it comes in is a bit small and makes it very difficult to get the blanket back in the bag. I had to just keep stuffing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tarullo

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep in car
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little blanket to keep in the car, especially if you have kids. It can be used in the car when someone inevitably gets cold while everyone else is hot. You can also use it as a picnic blanket or table cloth while traveling. We are heading to the beach in a couple days and I think this will clean up so much easier than a regular beach blanket. Plus it has corner pockets you can put things in, whether to keep up with them or to weigh down the blanket if it's breezy. It was easy to refold and get back into the carrying bag, which was definitely a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wroten

customer_reviews.title: Compact and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great water resistant outdoor blanket. It has pockets in the corners to fill with sand or stones to keep it from lifting up with the wind. It is super lightweight and compact, so easy to pack for a day trip or camping trip. It also has a carabiner so that it can easily attach to your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Blanket is super useful. Light weight. The color selection is fantastic. Great item for the beach or to watch fireworks in the grass. Everyone needs one of these.
customer_reviews.author: JRH

customer_reviews.title: Nice little blanket but keep away from the beach
customer_reviews.text: Used it at the beach. I needed to put rocks in the pockets. I never received any type of stakes keep it in the ground. I took it home and tried to wash the sand off. I used a WORX power sprayer at full blast. Not all the sand came off. I wish the sand was easier to come off. It’s a little smaller than I though it would be but that’s on my end not theirs. All and all it’s a nice blanket just won’t use it at the beach anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M Sherring

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for the price. It is not really a "blanket", it is modern tech material that provides protection from the sand and moisture. Nice compact and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: JimBob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for me and one for a gift. I will use mine at spirting events or as a pallet for picnics. The other will he used to lay on while rifle shooting. These fold up so small and are so easy to carry with you!!!
customer_reviews.author: aholloway

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Small, convenient package holds this waterproof blanket. The carrying bag also comes with a handy clip and the blanket is lightweight enough to clip onto a bag or pants without being a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: great size for 2
customer_reviews.text: As yet, I haven't used this item, but we wanted it for the beach, and when we travel. It seems to be perfect for our needs. After I use it, I will give full review. Stows away very small, so that is great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for someone who had requested it, so while I can't rate it, I'm assuming they were familiar with it...sorry I can't be more helpful. The star rating would not be fair of me to rate, but in order to submit, I had to enter a rating.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for boy scout camping trip
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons each got one of these and have used them for all their camping trips. They like them for their ease of packing and usefulness for protection from ground.
customer_reviews.author: wally

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it bought one as a small tent footprint for backpacking 4 years ago used it a bunch and recently bought a second one to keep in my daypack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A perfect companion for my trips to the beach
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect complement to my trips to the beach. I can put this down before I lay my towels down. This keeps my towels from getting sandy. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ski Bum

customer_reviews.title: What the picture show is different..shows a little bit longer...maybe the angle of the photo.
customer_reviews.text: When the package was open I was surprised of the side when place it on the floor...just a little to small...the price should be much less than what it is sold for...I will find something to use it for....
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Did not do a great job of keeping sand out at all also felt very cheap like an incredibly thin sheet would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Rios

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad, who is a biker and on the road quit often. This blanket is perfect for a picnic or just to sit down somewhere on the side without getting dirty. It's very easy to fold up and put away. Packs small and it's attachable to a bag or even to your pants. My dad loves it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ervin

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this blanket to take to an outdoor music festival. It had rained the day before so we knew that the ground would be damp. It was perfect to be able to put this down as we moved throughout the day and not have to carry around a big wet blanket all day.
customer_reviews.author: Monae

customer_reviews.title: Light weight durable and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great lightweight blanket easy to fold back up works great to throw out when stopping on the trail to eat keeps dirt off your food.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly17

customer_reviews.title: It will work fine for picnics too
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and WATERPROOF...not water resistant , which is why I chose this product. I'm bringing my dog on a plane and, although she rarely has accidents, I didn't want to take a chance in this novel environment for her.It will work fine for picnics too.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anna 789

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and compact
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from Walt Disney World with my entire family (13 total). All of that kids love the parades and I purchased whis more of the fact to protect everyone from the hot Florida pavement than dirt. It was extremely lightweight, went back into the travel pouch within minutes and held up. Fit about 5 of us. Nice product
customer_reviews.author: Michele Jaffee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blanket for hiking
customer_reviews.text: Super excited about this buy! This fits in your hand. Perfect for outdoors where you need something less bulky. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: OkieGal

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift request by my daughter. I have not taken it out of the pouch. What I can say is that it is a beautiful color. It is very compact and would easily fit into a backpack. The fabric is not flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: I looks sturdy, yet is lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet....upcoming camping trip. I looks sturdy, yet is lightweight. Looks to be well-made. I was able to refold and put it back in the sack, but the folds were pretty obvious. After the first use, it may not fit back like it's supposed to. Will add to this review once I have used it while camping.
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than initially thought
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at the measurements more carefully, but it advertises that the blanket can fit 2 people lying down. I’m not tall by most measures, but I find my feet and part of my calf often past the edge, which on wet grass can be an annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Beng

customer_reviews.title: perfect for carrying to outdoor events to sit on!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a small compact tarp/blanket to sit on during outdoor events. It’s small, easy to carry, and can fold/unfold quickly. Now I don’t need to worry about a wet bench or the ground being damp. Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great for backpackers.
customer_reviews.text: We used this on a recent backpacking trip as a staging mat when loading and unloading our backpacks. It was wonderful. It kept all of our gear clean and dry even though the blanket had to be place on a muddy surface. We also used this in the large garage on our tent (Big Agnes Slater 3+) to keep our packs and other non-clothing items off the ground over night. Lightweight and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, light and packable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!! Took it to Kauai for laying on the beach. I used it everyday! I love the way you can shake off the sand, fold it up and put it back in its’ pouch. I’m going to buy another one to keep in car, and some for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

product_meta.title: BEARZ Outdoor Beach Blanket, Waterproof Picnic Blanket 55″x60″ - Lightweight Camping Tarp, Compact Pocket Blanket, Festival Gear, Sand Proof Mat for Travel, Hiking, Sports - Packable w/Bag
feature_bullets: VERSATILE STYLE - This multipurpose pocket blanket is perfect for your outdoor adventures! Some of its uses? Beach blanket, waterproof picnic blanket, camping tarp, festival gear, hiking blanket - just to name a few. You can use it as an improvised shelter from the rain (rainfly) or simply as an emergency pad & gear to have around.

COMPACT, LIGHTWEIGHT & DURABLE – Your ideal outdoor gear, travel accessories and beach gear. This lightweight pocket blanket folds up to fit right into your palm. Hook it onto your backpack, throw it in your bag or keep it in your car - you never know when it’ll come in handy! Open up this portable, packable blanket and use it while at a concert, a camp, park, on a lawn, or anywhere outside!

WATERPROOF, PUNCTURE RESISTANT & SAND PROOF – The unique fabric of this waterproof blanket (moisture proof) is extremely durable and puncture resistant - a perfect accessory for your adventures in nature! Need a picnic mat, sand proof beach blanket or a waterproof tarp while backpacking? This multipurpose ground cover is for you.

IDEAL SIZE 55″ x 60″ & CLEVER DESIGN – This waterproof outdoor blanket is easy to fold & easy to use! The camping blanket has corner pockets you can fill up with sand or stones to keep it to the ground (windproof). The pocket loops at each corner are ready for camping stakes. The beach mat was designed to fit 2 persons comfortably, but it can fit up to 4 persons. Need cool unusual gifts for your dear friends? Or gift ideas for your family… or, why not gift yourself?

MATCHING ACCESSORIES - The outdoor blankets come with matching colored pouches and carabiners. Choose your favorite color - blue, green, red, pink, yellow or digital camouflage. Your choice: Blend in with nature or stand out. Go outdoors prepared & in style!
